\begin{tikzpicture}
    \def\minx{-5}
    \def\maxx{20}
    \def\miny{5}
    \def\maxy{25}

    \datavisualization[
      scientific axes = inner ticks,
      all axes = {grid},
      x axis = {length = \textwidth, label = {SNR (dB)},
      min value = \minx, max value = \maxx,
      ticks = {major = {at = {-5, 0, ..., 20}}},
      grid = {major = {at = {-5, 0, ..., 20}}}},
      y axis = {length = 0.7\textwidth, label = {$\theta_i$ (dB)},
      min value = \miny, max value = \maxy, ticks = few},
      visualize as line/.list = {1, 2, 3, 4},
      1 = {pin in data = {text = {BD}}, style = {blue}},
      2 = {pin in data = {text' = {SU}, pin angle = 45}, style = {red, dashed}},
      3 = {pin in data = {text = {Lower bound}, pin angle = 45}, style = {black, densely dotted}},
      4 = {pin in data = {text' = {Upper bound}, pin angle = 45}, style = {black, densely dotted}}
  ]
